query:
-- Add new fields to prioritization_criteria table
ALTER TABLE prioritization_criteria 
ADD COLUMN status ENUM('active','disabled','deleted') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
ADD COLUMN portfolioId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN deletedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN deletedBy INT NULL;

-- Add new fields to project_scores table
ALTER TABLE project_scores
ADD COLUMN companyId INT NULL;

-- Add new fields to criteria_audit_log table
ALTER TABLE criteria_audit_log
ADD COLUMN oldStatus ENUM('active','disabled','deleted') NULL,
ADD COLUMN newStatus ENUM('active','disabled','deleted') NULL,
ADD COLUMN impactedProjects INT DEFAULT 0;
